story.iWant: to see key vessel information when I hover over a vessel on the map
story.soThat: I can quickly get details without clicking on each vessel
story.tasks: - [ ] Task 1: Design the content and layout of the vessel hover tooltip. - [ ] Task 2: Implement the front-end logic to display the tooltip on vessel hover. - [ ] Task 3: Integrate with vessel data services to populate tooltip content. - [ ] Task 4: Ensure the tooltip is responsive and performs well on various devices. - [ ] Task 5: Write unit and integration tests for the vessel hover tooltip functionality.

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Hovering over a vessel displays a tooltip with its name, IMO, and current status. 2. The tooltip appears quickly and does not obstruct other map elements. 3. The tooltip disappears when the mouse leaves the vessel area.

doc.title: Epics and Stories for HarborFlow Suite
doc.snippet: As a user, I want to see key vessel information when I hover over a vessel on the map.

file.reason: The map component will be modified to handle hover events and display the tooltip.
A new component for the vessel tooltip.

constraints.constraint: The application follows Clean Architecture principles.
The frontend is a Blazor WebAssembly PWA.

tests.standards: xUnit for unit and integration tests. Playwright for E2E tests. Aim for 80% code coverage on core logic.
tests.ideas: - Verify that hovering over a vessel displays the tooltip. - Verify that the tooltip displays correct vessel information. - Verify that the tooltip disappears on mouse leave.
